channel.title: Hybridscape with the mopar client...login as admin + 99 all stats?
channel.description:
hi, i need some basic starter help. cant find any tuts on this so posting here. on the basic hybridscape source, i log in as admin with all 126 lvls. ive hosted the server and whenever anyone logs in they all get the same treatment. admin and 126 combat with bronze pick and all 99 skills.
1: how do i change this to REGULAR server sources where people start without adminship or 99 skills?
2: how do i change the spawn location?
:eek:

item.title: Hybridscape with the mopar client...login as admin + 99 all stats?
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

D27L7T:

No.

OWNED. and you can change it just go to the players file if you have one.

Read full topic

item.title: Hybridscape with the mopar client...login as admin + 99 all stats?
item.dc:creator: @kylebeeson kylebeeson
item.description:
@kylebeeson wrote:

do u wanna shut up[quote=“D27L7T, post:3, topic:18985”][quote author=kylebeeson link=topic=28811.msg330997#msg330997 date=1161304469]
u cant u need a better source use somit like chesescape or testscape to get it better and go on charter file and change ure rights and stats and players will log on at lvl 3 good luck i hope i helped
[/quote]

You can, kyle just is too much a noob to know how. Hybridscape > Testscape.[/quote]

Read full topic
